sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A fooles bolt is soone shot Good friends beware, I'me like to hit yee, what ere you be heer's that will fit yee; which way soeuer that you goe, at you I ayme my bolt and bowe. To the tune of, Oh no no no not yet. T. F., fl. 1630.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill
[By E. Allde?] for I. G[rismond], Printed at London : [ca. 1630]
In verse. A ballad; in two parts. Signed at end: T.F. Printer's name and publication date suggested by STC; publisher's name from STC. Verse - "Stand wide my masters, and take heed,". Reproduction of the original in the Pepys Library.
=======
